name: @muenchen/digiwf-apps
description: Vue JS Monorepo with Lerna and Vite

scripts.init: npm install && npm run clean && lerna bootstrap
scripts.clean: lerna clean --yes && lerna exec rimraf dist
scripts.serve: npm run build && lerna run dev --stream --parallel
scripts.e2e:local:gui: bash -c 'rm tests/downloads/*;' & npx cypress open --config-file tests/cypress.config.ts
scripts.e2e:local:generate-html-report: npx mochawesome-merge tests/results/*.json > e2e_report.json & npx marge e2e_report.json -o tests/results & bash -c 'rm -rf tests/reports/assets/; mv tests/results/assets/ tests/reports; mv tests/results/e2e_report.html tests/reports/`date +%d.%m.%y-%H-%M`_e2e_report.html; rm e2e_report.json;'
scripts.e2e:local: bash -c 'rm tests/downloads/*; rm tests/results/mocha*;' && npx cypress run --config-file tests/cypress.config.ts --headless --browser chrome & npm run e2e:local:generate-html-report
